about_the_game:
Feel the music of different worlds from seven XGAMER theme songs! 7 completely independently designed, ups and downs melodies can definitely become a part of your life!

Looking forward to meeting you in the world of XGAMER!
detailed_description:
Feel the music of different worlds from seven XGAMER theme songs! 7 completely independently designed, ups and downs melodies can definitely become a part of your life!

Looking forward to meeting you in the world of XGAMER!
name: XGAMER - AI Revolution | Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 46.9 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 263.4 MB available space
